name: Kumchenga borehole
comments_on_pumping_test: Pumping test was set at 0.25l/sec constant rate. Initial static water level was 6.57m from top of pedestal and the pump depth was 30.2 (2 meteres from bottom). Pumping lasted for 40 mins while at the rate of 0.25l/sec. A one hour recovery was done and final water level was 17.01 representing a less than 60%.

name: Biti Kalanje  mnonje (Chowe 4) Borehole
comments_on_pumping_test: Pumping test was successful we managed 45 flow rate on 20 litre bucket and it was a highly yield borehole

name: Chowe mtwela borehole
comments_on_pumping_test: Pumping test was successfully done we pumped for 3 hours and recovery for 1 hour

name: Mjigo wa pa water board
comments_on_pumping_test:
Pumping test was set at 0.25l/sec at the pump depth of 38m. Static water level was 7.28m. After 2 hrs of pumping at constant rate, water level was 10.70m with dynamic water level approximately achieved at 10.5m (drawdown was approximately equal to recovery from aquifers).

Recovery for 60mins water level was 7.78m (0.50m from measured static water level). 

Pumping test was successful.

name: Nalikolo mpulura (Chowe 5)
comments_on_pumping_test: Pumping test was successful though we had three Bamboo logs inside it, was a high yield borehole

name: Balaimu mosque borehole 1
comments_on_pumping_test: Pumping test was successful for continuous 3 hours and it was a high yield borehole

name: tulisha borehole
other_water_level_reference_point: Level of the concrete around the side opening of the hand dug well
comments_on_pumping_test:
Pump was set at 0.25l/sec at static water level of 7.3m. The actual depth of the well is 8.88m however, it has a narrower bottom (unable for the pump to settle at the actual depth). Water level temporarily stabilized at 7.4m until pumping stopped after exactly 30 minutes at 7.5m.

Recovery remained constant at 7.5m throughout the one hour period.

name: Ngongondo  kulumisa Borehole
comments_on_pumping_test: Blackish water came out for atleas 30 minutes, then water was clear.

name: Mdala Borehole
comments_on_pumping_test: NA

name: Mitawa2 Chiunda borehole
comments_on_pumping_test: Pumping test was nicely done  it was a high yield borehole and even recovery was fast

name: Kwisinje 2 Borehole
comments_on_pumping_test:
Pumping test set at 0.25l/sec depth of 39.35m stabilized at 8.55m after 60 mins. Was stepped up to 0.5l/sec and stabilized at 9.85m after 30mins. It was finally stepped to full valve (1l/sec). Stabilized at about 13.08m until 2 hours (60mins, 30mins, 30 mins)

Over 95% recovery (7.71m) took 1 hr. Pumping test passed.

name: Kulinyenga borehole
comments_on_pumping_test:
Pump was set at 0.25l/sec at the depth of 20m and SWL of 7m. The actual depth of the borehole was not determined as a result of suspicious pipes discovered during camera Survey. 

Pumping lasted for 2 hours and water level stabilized at 9.1m. 99% Recovery (to 7.01m) took 30minutes.

Pumping test passed.

name: Chinguwo Borehole 2
comments_on_pumping_test: The pump could no longer go through the depth of 38.9m (dirty/uncased final 2m to the bottom). Therefore the pump depth was 36.9m and flow rate at 0.25 l/s. After 44 mins the water level had reached the pump depth. Pumping test failed. Recovery did not reach 50% after one hour.

name: Masikira borehole 2
comments_on_pumping_test:
Pump was set with a column of water about 29m. 0.25 l/s stabilized at 9.5m. Step drawdown was conducted at 0.5 l/s, 0.75 l/s and 1 l/s. After 2 hrs water level was 26.2.

Surprisingly, the well recover slightly less than 50%.

name: Robert Borehole
comments_on_pumping_test:
Pump set at 37.2m, SWL of 2.5m. Pumped at:
a. 0.25l/s : 30min, DWL 2.6m
b. 0.3l/s : 30min DWL 2.6m
c. 0.4l/s : 1 hr DWL 2.65
d. 0.5l/s : 1 hr DWL 2.67m
e. 0.75l/s : 3 hrs DWL 2.76m

f. Recovery: 10 mins : 2.54m

name: Malemiya 1 borehole
comments_on_pumping_test:
SWL at 1.7m

Pumped at 0.25l/s for 30 mins and DWL at 1.83m. Stepped up to 0.3l/s for 30 min, DWL at 1.89m. Stepped further to 0.75l/s and DWL at 2.03m for 1 hr. Finally at full valve (1.3l/s) for 4 hours.
Recovery after 20 mins WL at 1.75m.
